block_action.description: If set, the block action to be executed on blocks targeted by this raycast.
block_action.markdownDescription: If set, the block action to be executed on blocks targeted by this raycast.

block_condition.description: If set, the block condition that must be met by any block that is targeted in order to do actions on it.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If set, the block condition that must be met by any block that is targeted in order to do actions on it.

particle.description: The particle effect that is displayed on the ray.
particle.markdownDescription: The particle effect that is displayed on the ray.

spacing.description: If there is a particle effect, the spacing between the particles displayed on the ray.
spacing.markdownDescription: If there is a particle effect, the spacing between the particles displayed on the ray.

type.description:
[Bi-entity Action Type](../bientity_action_types.md).

Raycasts to the target entity from the actor entity.

Type ID: `apugli:raycast_between`
type.markdownDescription:
[Bi-entity Action Type](../bientity_action_types.md).

Raycasts to the target entity from the actor entity.

Type ID: `apugli:raycast_between`
